column1: 231299,Vessel Traffic Officer,,"Operate ships or other watercraft

column5: Monitor surroundings to detect potential hazards
column7: Choose optimal transportation routes or speeds
column11: Signal others to coordinate vehicle movement

column21: Monitor equipment operation to ensure proper functioning
